item.title: Boeing stock’s resounding recovery is suddenly in jeopardy after Air India crash
item.description: Boeing’s stock dropped after a 787 Dreamliner plane crashed in India, raising concerns over whether its recent rally may have just ended.

item.title: Stocks, bitcoin and gold are racing to record highs. Here’s what’s behind this rare convergence.
item.description: There’s one common thread underpinning this year’s race to record highs in all three assets, one analyst said.

item.title: We’ve all wanted to lash out at a former boss like Elon Musk did. How to do it with no regrets.

item.title: The dollar’s slide threatens your spending and savings in ways you wouldn’t expect. Here’s what to know about it.
item.description: U.S. dollar dominance provides Americans with many special economic, financial and geopolitical benefits.
